trans-unit.source: Difference with the starting angle, in radians
Different accessible roles have different states, and are rendered differently by assistive technologies.
trans-unit.target: 不同的无障碍角色有不同的状态,通过辅助技术呈现出不同的状态。

trans-unit.source: Different factory implementations use various different methods to allow developers to add the right widgets to listitems and to link those widgets with the item managed by the listitem. Finding a suitable factory implementation for the data displayed, the programming language and development environment is an important task that can simplify setting up the view tremendously.
trans-unit.target: 不同的工厂实现使用了各种不同的方法,让开发人员可以向listitems添加合适的widgets,并将这些widgets与listitem管理的项目联系起来。为显示的数据、编程语言和开发环境找到一个合适的工厂实现是一项重要的任务,可以极大地简化视图的设置。

trans-unit.source: Disconnects attribute for the renderer in area so that attribute will no longer be updated with values from the model.
trans-unit.target: 断开 attribute 的 renderer 在 area ，这样属性将不再与从模型值进行更新。

trans-unit.source: Distributes extra_space to child sizes by bringing smaller children up to natural size first.
trans-unit.target: 通过首先将较小的子级提高到自然 sizes ，将 extra_space 分配给子级。

trans-unit.source: Do not confuse this function with gtk_list_item_get_selected().
Do not confuse this function with gtk_tree_list_model_get_child_row().
Do not confuse this function with gtk_tree_list_model_get_row().
Do not use GTK-specific command line arguments
trans-unit.target: 不要使用GTK专用的命令行参数。

trans-unit.source: Do not use widget style properties
trans-unit.target: 不要使用小组件样式属性

trans-unit.source: Doesn't do anything, since text in labels can't be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 没有任何作用,因为标签中的文本不能删除。

trans-unit.source: Doesn't do anything, since text in labels can't be edited.
trans-unit.target: 没有任何作用,因为标签中的文本不能被编辑。
请勿以高度换宽度或以宽度换高度

trans-unit.source: Don't check for the existence of index.theme in the icon theme directory. Without this option, gtk4-update-icon-cache refuses to create an icon cache in a directory which does not appear to be the toplevel directory of an icon theme.
trans-unit.target: 不要检查图标主题目录中是否存在 index.theme 。如果没有此选项，则gtk4-update-icon-cache拒绝在似乎不是图标主题的顶级目录的目录中创建图标缓存。
不要将此属性与“ margin-bottom”混淆。
不要将此属性与“ margin-top”混淆。

trans-unit.source: Don't include image data in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 不要在缓存中包含图像数据。

trans-unit.source: Don't show a scrollbar, but don't force the size to follow the content. This can be used e.g. to make multiple scrolled windows share a scrollbar.
trans-unit.target: 不显示滚动条,但不强迫滚动条的大小跟随内容。这可以用来让多个滚动窗口共享一个滚动条。

trans-unit.source: Draw the toggle button as a radio button.
trans-unit.target: 将切换按钮画成单选按钮。

trans-unit.source: Draws a text caret using snapshot at the specified index of layout .
trans-unit.target: 使用 snapshot 在指定的 layout 索引处绘制文本插入标记。

trans-unit.source: Drop the internal reference GTK holds on toplevel windows.
trans-unit.target: 丢弃GTK在toplevel窗口上的内部引用。

trans-unit.source: Due to an oversight, this function does not escape special XML characters like gtk_message_dialog_new_with_markup() does. Thus, if the arguments may contain special XML characters, you should use g_markup_printf_escaped() to escape it.
trans-unit.target: 由于疏忽，此函数不会像 gtk_message_dialog_new_with_markup() 那样转义特殊的XML字符。因此，如果参数可能包含特殊的XML字符，则应使用 g_markup_printf_escaped() 对其进行转义。

trans-unit.source: During a DND operation, the actions are offered to potential drop targets. If actions include GDK_ACTION_MOVE, you need to listen to the “drag-end” signal and handle delete_data being TRUE.
trans-unit.target: 在DND操作期间，将动作提供给潜在的放置目标。如果 actions 包括 GDK_ACTION_MOVE ，则您需要监听“ drag-end”信号并处理 delete_data 为 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: During a drag operation, the first signal that a GtkDropTargetAsync emits is “accept”, which is meant to determine whether the target is a possible drop site for the ongoing drop. The default handler for the ::accept signal accepts the drop if it finds a compatible data format and an action that is supported on both sides.
trans-unit.target: 在拖动操作期间，GtkDropTargetAsync发出的第一个信号是“ accept”，这意味着确定目标是否是正在进行的放置的可能放置位置。:: accept信号的默认处理程序如果找到兼容的数据格式以及双方都支持的操作，则接受该丢弃。

trans-unit.source: During the DND operation, GtkDragSource emits signals that can be used to obtain updates about the status of the operation, but it is not normally necessary to connect to any signals, except for one case: when the supported actions include GDK_ACTION_MOVE, you need to listen for the “drag-end” signal and delete the data after it has been transferred.
trans-unit.target: 在DND操作期间，GtkDragSource发出可用于获取有关操作状态的更新的信号，但除一种情况外，通常无需连接任何信号：当支持的动作包括 GDK_ACTION_MOVE 时，您需要侦听输入“拖尾”信号，并在传输后删除数据。

trans-unit.source: During the Paint phase GTK receives a single “render” signal on the toplevel surface. The signal handler will create a snapshot object (which is a helper for creating a scene graph) and call the GtkWidget::snapshot() vfunc, which will propagate down the widget hierarchy. This lets each widget snapshot its content at the right place and time, correctly handling things like partial transparencies and overlapping widgets.
trans-unit.target: 在“绘制”阶段，GTK在顶层表面上接收到一个“渲染”信号。信号处理程序将创建一个快照对象（它是用于创建场景图的帮助器），并调用GtkWidget :: snapshot() vfunc，它将沿小部件层次结构传播。这样一来，每个小部件都可以在正确的时间和地点对内容进行快照，从而正确处理诸如部分透明胶片和重叠小部件之类的问题。

trans-unit.source: During the snapshotting of each widget, GTK automatically handles the CSS rendering according to the CSS box model. It snapshots first the background, then the border, then the widget content itself, and finally the outline.
trans-unit.target: 在每个widget的快照过程中,GTK根据CSS box模型自动处理CSS渲染。它首先快照背景,然后是边框,然后是小组件内容本身,最后是轮廓。

trans-unit.source: E.g., a paste operation that replaces the contents of the selection will cause only one signal emission (even though it is implemented by first deleting the selection, then inserting the new content, and may cause multiple ::notify::text signals to be emitted).
trans-unit.target: 例如,替换选区内容的粘贴操作,只会引起一个信号的发射(尽管它是通过先删除选区,再插入新内容来实现的,可能会引起多个::notify::text信号的发射)。

trans-unit.source: Each GtkConstraint is part of a system that will be solved by a GtkConstraintLayout in order to allocate and position each child widget.
trans-unit.target: 每个GtkConstraint是系统的一部分，该系统将由GtkConstraintLayout解决，以便分配和定位每个子控件。

trans-unit.source: Each GtkLayoutChild instance storing the layout properties for a specific child is created through the gtk_layout_manager_get_layout_child() method; a GtkLayoutManager controls the creation of its GtkLayoutChild instances by overriding the GtkLayoutManagerClass.create_layout_child() virtual function. The typical implementation should look like:
trans-unit.target: 每个GtkLayoutChild实例都通过 gtk_layout_manager_get_layout_child() 方法创建，用于存储特定子项的布局属性。一个GtkLayoutManager控制其的创建GtkLayoutChild通过重写GtkLayoutManagerClass.create_layout_child（）虚拟功能实例。典型的实现应如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Each GtkLayoutManager instance creating a GtkLayoutChild should use gtk_layout_manager_get_layout_child() every time it needs to query the layout properties; each GtkLayoutChild instance should call gtk_layout_manager_layout_changed() every time a property is updated, in order to queue a new size measuring and allocation.
trans-unit.target: 每个创建GtkLayoutChild的GtkLayoutManager实例在每次需要查询布局属性时都应使用 gtk_layout_manager_get_layout_child() 。每次更新属性时，每个GtkLayoutChild实例都应调用 gtk_layout_manager_layout_changed() ，以便将新的尺寸测量和分配排队。

trans-unit.source: Each GtkWidget can only have a GtkLayoutManager instance associated to it at any given time; it is possible, though, to replace the layout manager instance using gtk_widget_set_layout_manager().
trans-unit.target: 在任何给定时间，每个GtkWidget只能具有一个与其关联的GtkLayoutManager实例；但是，可以使用 gtk_widget_set_layout_manager() 替换布局管理器实例。

trans-unit.source: Each GtkAccessible implementation must provide a GtkATContext instance, which acts as a proxy to the specific platform’s accessibility API:
trans-unit.target: 每个 GtkAccessible 实现都必须提供一个GtkATContext实例，该实例充当特定平台的可访问性API的代理：

trans-unit.source: Each GTK toplevel window or dialog is associated with a windowing system surface. Child widgets such as buttons or entries don’t have their own surface; they use the surface of their toplevel.
trans-unit.target: 每个GTK顶级窗口或对话框都与一个窗口系统表面相关联。子小部件（例如按钮或条目）没有自己的表面；他们使用其顶层的表面。

trans-unit.source: Each UI control implements the GtkAccessible interface to allow widget and application developers to specify the roles, state, and relations between UI controls. This API is purely descriptive.
trans-unit.target: 每个UI控件都实现GtkAccessible接口，以允许小部件和应用程序开发人员指定UI控件之间的角色，状态和关系。该API纯粹是描述性的。

trans-unit.source: Each attribute accepts a value of a specific type.
trans-unit.target: 每个属性都接受一个特定类型的值。

trans-unit.source: Each child has two options that can be set, resize and shrink . If resize is true, then when the GtkPaned is resized, that child will expand or shrink along with the paned widget. If shrink is true, then that child can be made smaller than its requisition by the user. Setting shrink to FALSE allows the application to set a minimum size. If resize is false for both children, then this is treated as if resize is true for both children.
trans-unit.target: 每个孩子都有两个可以设置的选项： resize 和 shrink 。如果 resize 为true，则当调整GtkPaned的大小时，该子项将与平移窗口小部件一起扩展或缩小。如果 shrink 是正确的，则可以使该子项小于用户的要求。将 shrink 设置为 FALSE 允许应用程序设置最小大小。如果两个孩子的 resize 均为false，则将这两个孩子的 resize 视为true。

trans-unit.source: Each increment of the property causes the block to move by a little bit.
trans-unit.target: 属性的每一次增量都会使块移动一点点。

trans-unit.source: Each of the actions that a given button/strip/ring performs for a given mode is defined by GtkPadActionEntry, it contains an action name that will be looked up in the given GActionGroup and activated whenever the specified input element and mode are triggered.
trans-unit.target: GtkPadActionEntry定义了给定按钮/带/环针对给定模式执行的每个动作，它包含一个动作名称，该名称将在给定GActionGroup中进行查找，并在触发指定的输入元素和模式时被激活。

trans-unit.source: Each of the boxes contains a windowcontrols subnode, see GtkWindowControls for details, as well as other children.
trans-unit.target: 每个框都包含一个 windowcontrols 子节点，有关详细信息，请参见GtkWindowControls以及其他子级。

trans-unit.source: Each platform supported by GTK implements a GtkATContext subclass, and is responsible for updating the accessible state in response to state changes in GtkAccessible.
trans-unit.target: GTK支持的每个平台都实现GtkATContext子类，并负责响应GtkAccessible中的状态更改来更新可访问状态。

trans-unit.source: Each property name is part of the GtkAccessibleProperty enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 每个属性名称都是GtkAccessibleProperty枚举的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Each relation name is part of the GtkAccessibleRelation enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 每个关系名称都是GtkAccessibleRelation枚举的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Each role is part of the widget’s instance, and cannot be changed over time or as the result of a user action. Roles allows assistive technology applications to identify a UI control and decide how to present it to a user; if a part of the application’s UI changes role, the control needs to be removed and replaced with another one with the appropriate role.
trans-unit.target: 每个角色都是窗口小部件实例的一部分，并且不能随时间或作为用户操作的结果进行更改。角色使辅助技术应用程序可以识别UI控件并决定如何将其呈现给用户。如果应用程序的UI的一部分更改了角色，则需要删除该控件，并替换为具有适当角色的另一个控件。

trans-unit.source: Each role name is part of the GtkAccessibleRole enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 每个角色名称都是GtkAccessibleRole枚举的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Each row in the grid can have its own local baseline, but only one of those is global, meaning it will be the baseline in the parent of the grid .
trans-unit.target: 网格中的每一行都可以有自己的局部基线，但是其中只有一个是全局基线，这意味着它将成为 grid 父级中的基线。

trans-unit.source: Each state name is part of the GtkAccessibleState enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 每个状态名称都是GtkAccessibleState枚举的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Each tag is stored in a GtkTextTagTable. A tag table defines a set of tags that can be used together. Each buffer has one tag table associated with it; only tags from that tag table can be used with the buffer. A single tag table can be shared between multiple buffers, however.
trans-unit.target: 每个标签都存储在GtkTextTagTable中。标签表定义了一组可以一起使用的标签。每个缓冲区都有一个与之相关的标签表。缓冲区中只能使用该标签表中的标签。但是，单个标签表可以在多个缓冲区之间共享。
编辑后的字段需要电子邮件地址
编辑后的字段需要数字
编辑后的字段需要电话号码

trans-unit.source: Edited field expects the name of a person
trans-unit.target: 编辑后的字段希望使用人名。

trans-unit.source: Embed page size combo box and orientation combo box into page setup page.
trans-unit.target: 将页面大小组合框和方向组合框嵌入到页面设置页面。

trans-unit.source: Embed page size combo box and orientation combo box into page setup page. Selected page setup is stored as default page setup in GtkPrintOperation.
trans-unit.target: 将页面大小组合框和方向组合框嵌入到页面设置页中。所选页面设置将作为默认页面设置存储在GtkPrintOperation中。
连续滚动完成后发出“减速”信号。
发出带有水平三角带的卷轴。
发出带有垂直三角带的卷轴。

trans-unit.source: Emits ::row_changed for each row in the child model, which causes the filter to re-evaluate whether a row is visible or not.
trans-unit.target: 对子模型中的每一行发出::row_changed,使过滤器重新评估一行是否可见。

trans-unit.source: Emits the “apply-tag” signal on buffer . The default handler for the signal applies tag to the given range. start and end do not have to be in order.
trans-unit.target: 在 buffer 上发出“ apply-tag”信号。信号的默认处理程序将 tag 应用于给定范围。 start 和 end 不必一定井井有条。

trans-unit.source: Emits the “clicked” signal on the column. This function will only work if tree_column is clickable.
trans-unit.target: 在列上发出“单击”信号。仅当可单击 tree_column 时,此功能才起作用。

trans-unit.source: Emits the “remove-tag” signal. The default handler for the signal removes all occurrences of tag from the given range. start and end don’t have to be in order.
trans-unit.target: 发出“删除标签”信号。信号的默认处理程序会删除给定范围内所有出现的 tag 。 start 和 end 不一定要井井有条。

trans-unit.source: Emits the “response” signal with the given response_id .
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的 response_id 发出“ response”信号。

trans-unit.source: Emits the “color-activated” signal for the given color.
trans-unit.target: 发出给定颜色的“颜色激活”信号。

trans-unit.source: Emits the “response” signal with the given response ID.
trans-unit.target: 发出具有给定响应ID的“响应”信号。

trans-unit.source: Emits the “changed” signal to notify all users of the filter that the filter changed. Users of the filter should then check items again via gtk_filter_match().
trans-unit.target: 发出“ changed”信号以通知过滤器的所有用户该过滤器已更改。然后，过滤器的用户应通过 gtk_filter_match() 再次检查项目。

trans-unit.source: Emits the “changed” signal to notify all users of the sorter that it has changed. Users of the sorter should then update the sort order via gtk_sorter_compare().
trans-unit.target: 发出“已更改”信号以通知分拣器的所有用户其已更改。然后，排序器的用户应通过 gtk_sorter_compare() 更新排序顺序。

trans-unit.source: Emits the “mark-set” signal as notification of the mark's initial placement.
trans-unit.target: 发出“标记设置”信号，以通知标记的初始位置。

trans-unit.source: Emits the “tag-changed” signal on the GtkTextTagTable where the tag is included.
trans-unit.target: 在包含标签的GtkTextTagTable上发出“标签已更改”信号。

trans-unit.source: Emits the “toggled” signal on the GtkToggleButton. There is no good reason for an application ever to call this function.
trans-unit.target: 在GtkToggleButton上发出“切换”信号。没有充分的理由让应用程序调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Emits the “row-has-child-toggled” signal on tree_model . This should be called by models after the child state of a node changes.
trans-unit.target: 在 tree_model 上发出“行有子的切换”信号。节点的子状态更改后，模型应调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Emitted after all pages have been rendered. A handler for this signal can clean up any resources that have been allocated in the “begin-print” handler.
trans-unit.target: 呈现所有页面后发出。该信号的处理程序可以清除“ begin-print”处理程序中分配的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: Emitted after change of selected printer.
trans-unit.target: 更换所选打印机后发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted after change of selected printer. The actual page setup and print settings are passed to the custom widget, which can actualize itself according to this change.
trans-unit.target: 更改所选打印机后发出。实际的页面设置和打印设置被传递给自定义小组件,小组件可根据此更改实现自身。

trans-unit.source: Emitted after scroll is finished if the GTK_EVENT_CONTROLLER_SCROLL_KINETIC flag is set. vel_x and vel_y express the initial velocity that was imprinted by the scroll events. vel_x and vel_y are expressed in pixels/ms.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了GTK_EVENT_CONTROLLER_SCROLL_KINETIC标志，则在滚动完成后发出。 vel_x 和 vel_y 表示滚动事件所产生的初始速度。 vel_x 和 vel_y 以像素/毫秒表示。

trans-unit.source: Emitted after the “begin-print” signal, but before the actual rendering starts. It keeps getting emitted until a connected signal handler returns TRUE.
trans-unit.target: 在“开始打印”信号之后但在实际渲染开始之前发出。它一直发出，直到连接的信号处理程序返回 TRUE 为止。

trans-unit.source: Emitted after the user has finished changing print settings in the dialog, before the actual rendering starts.
trans-unit.target: 在用户完成在对话框中更改打印设置后,在实际渲染开始前发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted at between the various phases of the print operation.
trans-unit.target: 在打印操作的各个阶段之间发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted at between the various phases of the print operation. See GtkPrintStatus for the phases that are being discriminated. Use gtk_print_operation_get_status() to find out the current status.
trans-unit.target: 在打印操作的各个阶段之间发出。有关要区分的阶段，请参见GtkPrintStatus。使用 gtk_print_operation_get_status() 找出当前状态。

trans-unit.source: Emitted before clamping a value, to give the application a chance to adjust the bounds.
trans-unit.target: 在夹紧一个值之前发出,给应用程序一个调整边界的机会。

trans-unit.source: Emitted every time a new tag is added in the GtkTextTagTable.
trans-unit.target: 每次在GtkTextTagTable中添加新标签时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted every time a tag in the GtkTextTagTable changes.
trans-unit.target: 每次GtkTextTagTable中的标签更改时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted every time a tag is removed from the GtkTextTagTable.
trans-unit.target: 每次从GtkTextTagTable中删除标签时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted for each GDK event delivered to controller .
trans-unit.target: 对于每个传递给 controller GDK事件，都发出该事件。

trans-unit.source: Emitted for every page that is printed. The signal handler must render the page_nr 's page onto the cairo context obtained from context using gtk_print_context_get_cairo_context().
trans-unit.target: 每打印一页发射一次。信号处理程序必须将 page_nr 的页面呈现到使用 gtk_print_context_get_cairo_context() 从 context 获得的cairo上下文中。

trans-unit.source: Emitted once for every page that is printed, to give the application a chance to modify the page setup.
trans-unit.target: 每打印一页就发出一次,给应用程序一个修改页面设置的机会。

trans-unit.source: Emitted once for every page that is printed, to give the application a chance to modify the page setup. Any changes done to setup will be in force only for printing this page.
trans-unit.target: 每打印一页输出一次，使应用程序有机会修改页面设置。对 setup 所做的任何更改将仅对打印此页面有效。

trans-unit.source: Emitted right before “begin-print” if you added a custom widget in the “create-custom-widget” handler. When you get this signal you should read the information from the custom widgets, as the widgets are not guaraneed to be around at a later time.
trans-unit.target: 如果在“ create-custom-widget”处理程序中添加了自定义小部件，则在“ begin-print”之前发出。当您收到此信号时，您应该从自定义窗口小部件中读取信息，因为这些窗口小部件不会保证在以后出现。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when “has-tooltip” is TRUE and the hover timeout has expired with the cursor hovering "above" widget ; or emitted when widget got focus in keyboard mode.
trans-unit.target: 当“ has-tooltip”为 TRUE 并且鼠标指针悬停在“ above” widget 上方时，悬停超时已到期；或当 widget 在键盘模式下获得焦点时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a GtkWindow is added to application through gtk_application_add_window().
Emitted when a GtkWindow is removed from application , either as a side-effect of being destroyed or explicitly through gtk_application_remove_window().
trans-unit.target: 从 application 删除GtkWindow时发出的消息，它是被销毁的副作用，或者是通过 gtk_application_remove_window() 显式地发出的。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a color is activated from the color chooser. This usually happens when the user clicks a color swatch, or a color is selected and the user presses one of the keys Space, Shift+Space, Return or Enter.
trans-unit.target: 当颜色选择器中的颜色被激活时发出。这通常发生在用户点击色板,或选择了一种颜色,用户按Space、Shift+Space、Return或Enter等键之一时。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a custom item, previously added with gtk_app_chooser_button_append_custom_item(), is activated from the dropdown menu.
trans-unit.target: 从下拉菜单激活先前添加了 gtk_app_chooser_button_append_custom_item() 的自定义项目时触发。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a font is activated. This usually happens when the user double clicks an item, or an item is selected and the user presses one of the keys Space, Shift+Space, Return or Enter.
trans-unit.target: 当字体被激活时发出。这通常发生在用户双击一个项目,或选择一个项目,用户按空格、Shift+Space、回车或回车键中的一个键时。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a system setting was changed. Must chain up.
trans-unit.target: 系统设置被改变时发出。必须链起来。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when an action widget is clicked or the application programmer calls gtk_info_bar_response(). The response_id depends on which action widget was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在单击操作窗口小部件或应用程序程序员调用 gtk_info_bar_response() 时发出。该 response_id 取决于单击的动作部件。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when an action widget is clicked, the dialog receives a delete event, or the application programmer calls gtk_dialog_response(). On a delete event, the response ID is GTK_RESPONSE_DELETE_EVENT. Otherwise, it depends on which action widget was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 单击动作窗口小部件，对话框接收到删除事件或应用程序程序员调用 gtk_dialog_response() 时发出。发生删除事件时，响应ID为GTK_RESPONSE_DELETE_EVENT。否则，取决于单击哪个操作窗口小部件。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when an application item is activated from the widget's list.
trans-unit.target: 从小组件的列表中激活应用程序项目时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when an application item is selected from the widget's list.
trans-unit.target: 从小组件的列表中选择应用程序项目时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when an offset specified on the bar changes value as an effect to gtk_level_bar_add_offset_value() being called.
trans-unit.target: 当在条形图上指定的偏移量更改值作为调用 gtk_level_bar_add_offset_value() 的效果时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when displaying the print dialog. If you return a widget in a handler for this signal it will be added to a custom tab in the print dialog. You typically return a container widget with multiple widgets in it.
trans-unit.target: 显示打印对话框时发出。如果您在该信号的处理程序中返回一个小组件,它将被添加到打印对话框的自定义选项卡中。通常您会返回一个包含多个小组件的容器小组件。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when one or more of the GtkAdjustment properties have been changed, other than the “value” property.
trans-unit.target: 当更改了一个或多个GtkAdjustment属性（而不是“ value”属性）时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the “value” property has been changed.
trans-unit.target: 当“值”属性已更改时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the active application on the GtkAppChooserButton changes.
trans-unit.target: 当GtkAppChooserButton上的活动应用程序更改时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the attributes of the accessible for the GtkATContext instance change.
trans-unit.target: 当GtkATContext实例的辅助功能的属性更改时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the button has been activated (pressed and released).
trans-unit.target: 当按钮被激活(按下并释放)时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the buttons's “active” flag changes.
trans-unit.target: 当按钮的“活动”标志更改时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the column's header has been clicked.
Emitted when the current icon theme is switched or GTK detects that a change has occurred in the contents of the current icon theme.
trans-unit.target: 当当前图标主题被切换或GTK检测到当前图标主题的内容发生变化时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the current recently used resources manager changes its contents, either by calling gtk_recent_manager_add_item() or by another application.
trans-unit.target: 当前最新使用的资源管理器通过调用 gtk_recent_manager_add_item() 或另一个应用程序更改其内容时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the focus is moved.
Emitted when the pointer moves inside the widget.
trans-unit.target: 指针在小组件内移动时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the print operation run has finished doing everything required for printing.
trans-unit.target: 当打印操作运行完成了打印所需的所有操作时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the range value changes.
trans-unit.target: 范围值发生变化时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the selection state of some of the items in model changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 model 中某些项目的选择状态更改时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the session manager is about to end the session, only if “register-session” is TRUE. Applications can connect to this signal and call gtk_application_inhibit() with GTK_APPLICATION_INHIBIT_LOGOUT to delay the end of the session until state has been saved.
trans-unit.target: 仅在“ register-session”为 TRUE 时，在会话管理器即将结束会话时发出。应用程序可以连接到该信号，并使用 GTK_APPLICATION_INHIBIT_LOGOUT 调用 gtk_application_inhibit() 来延迟会话的结束，直到状态被保存为止。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the user or a function changes the current page.
trans-unit.target: 当用户或函数更改当前页面时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the user responds to the dialog.
trans-unit.target: 当用户对对话框作出响应时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the user selects a day.
trans-unit.target: 当用户选择日期时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the user switched to the next month.
trans-unit.target: 当用户切换到下个月时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the user switched to the previous month.
trans-unit.target: 当用户切换到上月时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when user switched to the next year.
trans-unit.target: 当用户切换到下一年度时,发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when user switched to the previous year.
trans-unit.target: 当用户切换到上一年时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted whenever the selection has (possibly) changed. Please note that this signal is mostly a hint. It may only be emitted once when a range of rows are selected, and it may occasionally be emitted when nothing has happened.
trans-unit.target: 每当选择(可能)发生变化时发出。请注意,这个信号主要是一个提示。它可能只在一系列行被选中时发出一次,偶尔在没有发生任何事情时也会发出。

trans-unit.source: Enable or disable an action installed with gtk_widget_class_install_action().
trans-unit.target: 启用或禁用通过 gtk_widget_class_install_action() 安装的操作。

trans-unit.source: Enable specific backends for GDK. If none of these options are given, the Wayland backend will be enabled by default, if the platform is Linux; the X11 backend will also be enabled by default, unless the platform is Windows, in which case the default is win32, or the platform is macOS, in which case the default is macOS. If any backend is explicitly enabled or disabled, no other platform will be enabled automatically.
trans-unit.target: 启用GDK的特定后端。如果没有给出这些选项,如果平台是 Linux,Wayland 后台将被默认启用;X11 后台也将被默认启用,除非平台是 Windows,在这种情况下,默认为 win32,或者平台是 macOS,在这种情况下,默认为 macOS。如果明确启用或禁用任何后台,则不会自动启用其他平台。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables overlay scrolling for this scrolled window.
trans-unit.target: 启用或禁用该滚动窗口的叠加滚动。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables rubber banding in tree_view . If the selection mode is GTK_SELECTION_MULTIPLE, rubber banding will allow the user to select multiple rows by dragging the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 在 tree_view 中启用或禁用橡皮筋。如果选择模式为GTK_SELECTION_MULTIPLE，橡皮筋将允许用户通过拖动鼠标选择多行。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables the emission of “query-tooltip” on widget . A value of TRUE indicates that widget can have a tooltip, in this case the widget will be queried using “query-tooltip” to determine whether it will provide a tooltip or not.
trans-unit.target: 在 widget 上启用或禁用“ query-tooltip”的发射。值为 TRUE 表示 widget 可以具有工具提示，在这种情况下，将使用“ query-tooltip”查询窗口小部件以确定是否将提供工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables the fixed height mode of tree_view . Fixed height mode speeds up GtkTreeView by assuming that all rows have the same height. Only enable this option if all rows are the same height and all columns are of type GTK_TREE_VIEW_COLUMN_FIXED.
trans-unit.target: 启用或禁用 tree_view 的固定高度模式。固定高度模式通过假设所有行都具有相同的高度来加快GtkTreeView的速度。仅当所有行的高度相同并且所有列的类型 GTK_TREE_VIEW_COLUMN_FIXED 才启用此选项。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables the hover expansion mode of tree_view . Hover expansion makes rows expand or collapse if the pointer moves over them.
trans-unit.target: 启用或禁用 tree_view 的悬停扩展模式。如果指针移到行上方，则悬停扩展会使行扩展或折叠。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables the hover selection mode of tree_view . Hover selection makes the selected row follow the pointer. Currently, this works only for the selection modes GTK_SELECTION_SINGLE and GTK_SELECTION_BROWSE.
trans-unit.target: 启用或禁用 tree_view 的悬停选择模式。悬停选择使选定的行跟随指针。当前，这仅适用于选择模式 GTK_SELECTION_SINGLE 和 GTK_SELECTION_BROWSE 。

trans-unit.source: Enables the popup menu: if the user clicks with the right mouse button on the tab labels, a menu with all the pages will be popped up.
trans-unit.target: 启用弹出式菜单:如果用户用鼠标右键点击标签,将弹出一个包含所有页面的菜单。

trans-unit.source: Ends a seek operation started via GtkMediaStream.seek() as a failure. This will not cause an error on the stream and will assume that playback continues as if no seek had happened.
trans-unit.target: 将通过 GtkMediaStream.seek()启动的寻道操作作为失败结束。这不会在流媒体上引起错误,并且会假设播放继续,就像没有发生过seek一样。

trans-unit.source: Ends a seek operation started via GtkMediaStream.seek() successfully. This function will unset the GtkMediaStream:ended property if it was set.
trans-unit.target: 成功结束通过 GtkMediaStream.seek()启动的寻道操作。如果GtkMediaStream:end属性已被设置,该函数将取消设置。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the GdkGLContext used by area is associated with the GtkGLArea.
Ensures that the area framebuffer object is made the current draw and read target, and that all the required buffers for the area are created and bound to the framebuffer.
trans-unit.target: 确保将 area 帧缓冲区对象作为当前绘制和读取目标，并确保创建 area 所需的所有缓冲区并将其绑定到帧缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the cursor is shown (i.e. not in an 'off' blink interval) and resets the time that it will stay blinking (or visible, in case blinking is disabled).
trans-unit.target: 确保光标显示(即不在 "关闭 "的闪烁间隔内),并重置光标保持闪烁的时间(或可见,如果闪烁被禁用)。

trans-unit.source: Enters the main loop and waits for widget to be “drawn”. In this context that means it waits for the frame clock of widget to have run a full styling, layout and drawing cycle.
trans-unit.target: 进入主循环并等待 widget 被“绘制”。在这种情况下，这意味着它将等待 widget 的帧时钟运行完整的样式，布局和绘制周期。

trans-unit.source: Enumeration will start automatically when a the “file” property is set.
trans-unit.target: 设置“文件”属性后，枚举将自动开始。

trans-unit.source: Erases the visited page history so the back button is not shown on the current page, and removes the cancel button from subsequent pages.
trans-unit.target: 删除访问过的页面历史,使当前页面不显示返回按钮,并删除后续页面的取消按钮。

trans-unit.source: Error codes that identify various errors that can occur while using GtkBuilder.
trans-unit.target: 错误代码，标识使用GtkBuilder时可能发生的各种错误。

trans-unit.source: Error codes that identify various errors that can occur while using the GTK printing support.
trans-unit.target: 识别使用GTK打印支持时可能发生的各种错误的错误代码。

trans-unit.source: Errors that can occur while parsing CSS.
trans-unit.target: 解析CSS时可能出现的错误。
剩余未分类物品的估计数

trans-unit.source: Estimates progress of an ongoing sorting operation
trans-unit.target: 估计正在进行的分拣作业的进度

trans-unit.source: Evaluates the given expression and on success stores the result in value . The GType of value will be the type given by gtk_expression_get_value_type().
trans-unit.target: 计算给定的表达式，成功后将结果存储在 value 中。 value 的GType将是 gtk_expression_get_value_type() 给出的类型。

trans-unit.source: Evaluates the watched expression and on success stores the result in value .
trans-unit.target: 评估观察的表达式，并在成功时将结果存储在 value 。

trans-unit.source: Evaluates to TRUE if value was initialized with GTK_TYPE_EXPRESSION.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 GTK_TYPE_EXPRESSION 初始化了 value 则评估为 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Even if GTK installs multiple header files, only the top-level gtk/gtk.h header can be directly included by third-party code. The compiler will abort with an error if any other header is directly included.
trans-unit.target: 即使GTK安装了多个头文件，第三方代码也只能直接包含顶级 gtk/gtk.h 头。如果直接包含任何其他标头，则编译器将中止并显示错误。

trans-unit.source: Even if standard UI controls provided by GTK have accessibility information out of the box, there are some additional properties and considerations for application developers. For instance, if your application presents the user with a form to fill out, you should ensure that:
trans-unit.target: 即使GTK提供的标准UI控件具有开箱即用的可访问性信息,对于应用程序开发者来说,还有一些额外的属性和注意事项。例如,如果你的应用程序给用户提供了一个需要填写的表格,你应该确保:

trans-unit.source: Even though toggle actions have a state, they do not have a parameter. Therefore, a target value is not needed when referring to them — they will always be toggled on activation.
trans-unit.target: 即使切换动作具有状态，也没有参数。因此，引用目标值时不需要目标值-激活时将始终切换目标值。

trans-unit.source: Event controllers are standalone objects that can perform specific actions upon received GdkEvents. These are tied to a GtkWidget, and can be told of the event propagation phase at which they will manage the events.
trans-unit.target: 事件控制器是独立的对象，可以对收到的GdkEvents执行特定的操作。它们与GtkWidget绑定在一起，可以告知他们将在其中管理事件的事件传播阶段。

trans-unit.source: Events are delivered in the bubble phase. The bubble phase happens after the capture phase, and before the default handlers are run. This phase runs from the event widget, up to the toplevel.
trans-unit.target: 事件是在气泡阶段传递的,气泡阶段发生在捕获阶段之后,在默认处理程序运行之前。泡沫阶段发生在捕获阶段之后,在默认处理程序运行之前。这个阶段从事件部件开始,一直到toplevel。

trans-unit.source: Events are delivered in the capture phase. The capture phase happens before the bubble phase, runs from the toplevel down to the event widget. This option should only be used on containers that might possibly handle events before their children do.
trans-unit.target: 事件是在捕获阶段传递的。捕获阶段发生在气泡阶段之前,从toplevel向下运行到事件部件。这个选项应该只用于可能在其子代之前处理事件的容器。

trans-unit.source: Events are delivered in the default widget event handlers, note that widget implementations must chain up on button, motion, touch and grab broken handlers for controllers in this phase to be run.
trans-unit.target: 事件是在默认的widget事件处理程序中传递的,注意widget实现必须在按钮、运动、触摸和抓取破绽处理程序上链起来,以便控制器在这个阶段运行。

trans-unit.source: Events are handled regardless of what their target is.
trans-unit.target: 无论事件的目标是什么,都会被处理。

trans-unit.source: Events are not delivered to a widget which is insensitive or unmapped.
trans-unit.target: 事件不会传递给不敏感或未映射的小组件。

trans-unit.source: Events are only handled if their target is in the same GtkNative as the event controllers widget. Note that some event types have two targets (origin and destination).
trans-unit.target: 仅当事件的目标与事件控制器小部件位于同一GtkNative中时，才处理事件。请注意，某些事件类型具有两个目标（起源和目的地）。

trans-unit.source: Events handled by focus siblings can also activate the given focusable renderer .
trans-unit.target: 由焦点同级处理的事件也可以激活给定的可聚焦 renderer 。

trans-unit.source: Every GtkEmojiChooser consists of a main node called popover. The contents of the popover are largely implementation defined and supposed to inherit general styles. The top searchbar used to search emoji and gets the .emoji-searchbar style class itself. The bottom toolbar used to switch between different emoji categories consists of buttons with the .emoji-section style class and gets the .emoji-toolbar style class itself.
trans-unit.target: 每个GtkEmojiChooser都包含一个称为popover的主节点。弹出窗口的内容在很大程度上是实现定义的，应该继承通用样式。顶部的搜索栏用于搜索表情符号，并获取.emoji-searchbar样式类本身。用于在不同表情符号类别之间切换的底部工具栏由具有.emoji-section样式类的按钮组成，并获取.emoji-toolbar样式类本身。

trans-unit.source: Every GtkWindow maintains a single focus location (in the “focus-widget” property). The focus widget is the target widget for key events sent to the window. Only widgets which have “can-focus” set to TRUE can become the focus. Typically these are input controls such as entries or text fields, but e.g. buttons can take the focus too.
trans-unit.target: 每个GtkWindow都维护一个焦点位置（在“ focus-widget”属性中）。焦点小部件是发送到窗口的关键事件的目标小部件。只有将“可以聚焦”设置为 TRUE 的窗口小部件才能成为焦点。通常，这些是输入控件，例如条目或文本字段，但是例如按钮也可以成为焦点。

trans-unit.source: Every item in a model has a position which is the unsigned integer that describes where in the model the item is located. The first item in a model is at position 0. The position of an item can of course change as other items are added or removed from the model.
trans-unit.target: 模型中的每个项目都有一个位置，该位置是无符号整数，描述该项目在模型中的位置。模型中的第一个项目位于位置0。当然，当其他项目从模型中添加或删除时，项目的位置当然可以更改。

trans-unit.source: Every widget has one or more of these CSS nodes, and determines their name, state, style classes and how they are laid out as children and siblings in the overall node tree. The documentation for each widget explains what CSS nodes it has.
trans-unit.target: 每个widget都有一个或多个这样的CSS节点,并决定了它们的名称、状态、样式类以及它们在整体节点树中的子节点和同级节点的布局方式。每个widget的文档都会解释它有哪些CSS节点。

trans-unit.source: Exactly one element is selected. In some circumstances, such as initially or during a search operation, it’s possible for no element to be selected with GTK_SELECTION_BROWSE. What is really enforced is that the user can’t deselect a currently selected element except by selecting another element.
trans-unit.target: 恰好选择了一个元素。在某些情况下，例如最初或在搜索操作期间，可能无法使用 GTK_SELECTION_BROWSE 选择任何元素。真正强制执行的是，用户只能通过选择另一个元素来取消选择当前选择的元素。

trans-unit.source: Examples for widgets implementing GtkShortcutManager are GtkWindow and GtkPopover.
trans-unit.target: 实现GtkShortcutManager的小部件的示例是GtkWindow和GtkPopover。

trans-unit.source: Examples of frame rendering, showing the effect of border-image, border-color, border-width, border-radius and junctions:
trans-unit.target: 帧渲染示例，显示 border-image ， border-color ， border-width ， border-radius 和结的效果：

trans-unit.source: Expands the expander if it can be expanded.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以展开,就展开展开器。

trans-unit.source: Expands the row at path . This will also expand all parent rows of path as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 展开 path 处的行。这还将在必要时扩展 path 所有父行。

trans-unit.source: Explicitly sets the currently focused cell to renderer .
trans-unit.target: 将当前聚焦的单元格显式设置为 renderer 。

trans-unit.source: Explicitly stops the editing of the currently edited cell.
trans-unit.target: 明确停止编辑当前编辑的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Export to a file. This requires the export-filename property to be set.
trans-unit.target: 导出到文件。这需要设置 export-filename 属性。

trans-unit.source: Expression to evaluate to get the object to query or NULL to query the this object.
trans-unit.target: 要求值以获取要查询的对象的表达式，或者要查询 this 对象的 NULL 表达式。
每一级都有额外的缩进。

trans-unit.source: Extra space to redistribute among children after subtracting minimum sizes and any child padding from the overall allocation
trans-unit.target: 从总体分配中减去最小尺寸和任何儿童填充物后,重新分配给儿童的额外空间。

trans-unit.source: Extra spacing between graphemes, in Pango units.
trans-unit.target: 字词之间的额外间距,以盘古为单位。

trans-unit.source: FALSE displays the “invisible char” instead of the actual text (password mode).
trans-unit.target: FALSE显示“不可见字符”而不是实际文本（密码模式）。

trans-unit.source: FALSE if this represents a real hardware printer.
trans-unit.target: 如果这代表真正的硬件打印机,则为FALSE。

trans-unit.source: FALSE removes outside bevel from entry.
trans-unit.target: FALSE从入口处移除外侧斜面。

trans-unit.source: Factor by which to modify the default timeout.
Fetch an object build from the template XML for widget_type in this widget instance.
trans-unit.target: 从此 widget 实例中的 widget_type 的模板XML中获取对象构建。

trans-unit.source: Fetches a symbol previously added to self with gtk_builder_cscope_add_callback_symbol().
Fetches the GtkCellArea this context was created by.
Fetches the current allocation size for context .
Fetches the requested opacity for this widget. See gtk_widget_set_opacity().
trans-unit.target: 获取此窗口小部件的请求的不透明度。参见 gtk_widget_set_opacity() 。

trans-unit.source: Fetches the text from a label widget including any embedded underlines indicating mnemonics and Pango markup, as set by gtk_expander_set_label(). If the label text has not been set the return value will be NULL. This will be the case if you create an empty button with gtk_button_new() to use as a container.
trans-unit.target: 从标签窗口小部件中获取文本，包括由 gtk_expander_set_label() 设置的任何表示助记符和Pango标记的嵌入式下划线。如果尚未设置标签文本，则返回值为 NULL 。如果您使用 gtk_button_new() 创建一个空按钮用作容器，就会出现这种情况。

trans-unit.source: Fetches the text from a label widget including any embedded underlines indicating mnemonics and Pango markup. (See gtk_label_get_text()).
trans-unit.target: 从标签小部件中获取文本，其中包括任何表示助记符和Pango标记的嵌入式下划线。（请参阅 gtk_label_get_text() ）。

trans-unit.source: Fetches the text from a label widget, as displayed on the screen. This does not include any embedded underlines indicating mnemonics or Pango markup. (See gtk_label_get_label())
trans-unit.target: 从标签小部件中获取文本，如屏幕上显示的那样。这不包括任何表示助记符或Pango标记的嵌入式下划线。（请参阅 gtk_label_get_label() ）

trans-unit.source: Fetches the text from the label of the button, as set by gtk_button_set_label(). If the label text has not been set the return value will be NULL. This will be the case if you create an empty button with gtk_button_new() to use as a container.
trans-unit.target: 根据 gtk_button_set_label() 的设置，从按钮的标签中获取文本。如果尚未设置标签文本，则返回值为 NULL 。如果您使用 gtk_button_new() 创建一个空按钮用作容器，就会出现这种情况。

trans-unit.source: Fetches the transient parent for this window. See gtk_native_dialog_set_transient_for().
trans-unit.target: 获取此窗口的瞬时父级。参见 gtk_native_dialog_set_transient_for() 。

trans-unit.source: Fetches the transient parent for this window. See gtk_window_set_transient_for().
trans-unit.target: 获取此窗口的瞬时父级。请参阅 gtk_window_set_transient_for() 。

trans-unit.source: Fetches the value specified for the offset marker name in self , returning TRUE in case an offset named name was found.
trans-unit.target: 在 self 中获取为偏移标记 name 指定的值，如果找到名为 name 的偏移，则返回 TRUE 。
要加载和显示的文件名。

trans-unit.source: Files will be added to self from time to time while loading is going on. The order in which are added is undefined and may change in between runs.
trans-unit.target: 加载过程中会不时将文件添加到 self 。添加的顺序是不确定的，并且可能在两次运行之间改变。

trans-unit.source: Filesystem utilities — Functions for working with GIO
trans-unit.target: 文件系统实用程序—使用GIO的功能

trans-unit.source: Fills visible_rect with the currently-visible region of the buffer, in buffer coordinates. Convert to window coordinates with gtk_text_view_buffer_to_window_coords().
trans-unit.target: 在缓冲区坐标 visible_rect 的当前可见区域填充visible_rect。使用 gtk_text_view_buffer_to_window_coords() 转换为窗口坐标。

trans-unit.source: Fills visible_rect with the currently-visible region of the buffer, in tree coordinates. Convert to bin_window coordinates with gtk_tree_view_convert_tree_to_bin_window_coords(). Tree coordinates start at 0,0 for row 0 of the tree, and cover the entire scrollable area of the tree.
trans-unit.target: 用树坐标表示的缓冲区当前可见区域填充 visible_rect 。使用 gtk_tree_view_convert_tree_to_bin_window_coords() 转换为bin_window坐标。树的坐标从树的第0行开始于0,0，并覆盖树的整个可滚动区域。

trans-unit.source: Fills in path and cell with the current cursor path and cell. If the cursor isn’t currently set, then *path will be NULL. If no cell currently has focus, then *cell will be NULL.
trans-unit.target: 用当前光标路径和单元格填充 path 和 cell 格。如果当前未设置光标，则* path 将为 NULL 。如果当前没有单元格具有焦点，则* cell 将为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Fills in path and focus_column with the current path and focus column. If the cursor isn’t currently set, then *path will be NULL. If no column currently has focus, then *focus_column will be NULL.
trans-unit.target: 用当前路径和焦点列填充 path 和 focus_column 。如果当前未设置光标，则* path 将为 NULL 。如果当前没有列具有焦点，则* focus_column 将为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Fills in sort_column_id and order with the current sort column and the order. It returns TRUE unless the sort_column_id is GTK_TREE_SORTABLE_DEFAULT_SORT_COLUMN_ID or GTK_TREE_SORTABLE_UNSORTED_SORT_COLUMN_ID.
trans-unit.target: 填写 sort_column_id 和 order 与当前的排序列和顺序。除非 sort_column_id 为 GTK_TREE_SORTABLE_DEFAULT_SORT_COLUMN_ID 或 GTK_TREE_SORTABLE_UNSORTED_SORT_COLUMN_ID ,否则它返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Fills in width and height with the appropriate size of cell .
Fills in xalign and yalign with the appropriate values of cell .
Fills in xpad and ypad with the appropriate values of cell .
Fills in sort_column_id and order with the current sort column and the order.
trans-unit.target: 填入sort_column_id和当前排序列和顺序。

trans-unit.source: Fills the bounding rectangle in bin_window coordinates for the cell at the row specified by path and the column specified by column . If path is NULL, or points to a node not found in the tree, the y and height fields of the rectangle will be filled with 0. If column is NULL, the x and width fields will be filled with 0. The returned rectangle is equivalent to the background_area passed to gtk_cell_renderer_render(). These background areas tile to cover the entire bin window. Contrast with the cell_area , returned by gtk_tree_view_get_cell_area(), which returns only the cell itself, excluding surrounding borders and the tree expander area.
trans-unit.target: 在bin_window坐标中为 path 指定的行和column指定的 column 的单元格填充边界矩形。如果 path 为 NULL 或指向树中找不到的节点，则矩形的 y 和 height 字段将填充0。如果 column 为 NULL ，则 x 和 width 字段将填充0。返回的矩形为等效于传递给 gtk_cell_renderer_render() 的 background_area 。这些背景区域平铺以覆盖整个bin窗口。与 cell_area 对比，由 gtk_tree_view_get_cell_area() 返回，该函数仅返回单元格本身，不包括周围的边界和树扩展器区域。

trans-unit.source: Fills the bounding rectangle in bin_window coordinates for the cell at the row specified by path and the column specified by column . If path is NULL, or points to a path not currently displayed, the y and height fields of the rectangle will be filled with 0. If column is NULL, the x and width fields will be filled with 0. The sum of all cell rects does not cover the entire tree; there are extra pixels in between rows, for example. The returned rectangle is equivalent to the cell_area passed to gtk_cell_renderer_render(). This function is only valid if tree_view is realized.
trans-unit.target: 在bin_window坐标中为 path 指定的行和column指定的 column 的单元格填充边界矩形。如果 path 为 NULL 或指向当前未显示的路径，则矩形的 y 和 height 字段将填充为0。如果 column 为 NULL ，则 x 和 width 字段将填充0。没有覆盖整个树；例如，在行之间有多余的像素。返回的矩形相当于 cell_area 传递给 gtk_cell_renderer_render() 。仅当实现 tree_view 时此功能才有效。

trans-unit.source: Fills the bounding rectangle in widget coordinates for the cell specified by path and cell . If cell is NULL the main cell area is used.
trans-unit.target: 在小部件坐标中为 path 和 cell 指定的单元格填充边界矩形。如果 cell 为 NULL ，则使用主单元格区域。

trans-unit.source: Filter specific rows, based on data from a “visible column”, a column storing booleans indicating whether the row should be filtered or not, or based on the return value of a “visible function”, which gets a model, iter and user_data and returns a boolean indicating whether the row should be filtered or not.
trans-unit.target: 根据“可见列”中的数据过滤特定行，该列存储表示是否应过滤该行的布尔值，或者基于“可见函数”的返回值，该返回值获取模型，iter和user_data以及返回一个布尔值，指示是否应过滤该行。

trans-unit.source: Filtering by mime types handles aliasing and subclassing of mime types; e.g. a filter for text/plain also matches a file with mime type application/rtf, since application/rtf is a subclass of text/plain. Note that GtkFileFilter allows wildcards for the subtype of a mime type, so you can e.g. filter for image/*.
trans-unit.target: 按mime类型过滤可处理mime类型的别名和子类化。例如，用于文本/纯文本的过滤器还匹配mime类型为application / rtf的文件，因为application / rtf是文本/纯文本的子类。请注意，GtkFileFilter允许通配符作为mime类型的子类型，因此您可以例如对image / *进行过滤。

trans-unit.source: Filters may change what items they match through their lifetime. In that case, they will emit the “changed” signal to notify that previous filter results are no longer valid and that items should be checked again via gtk_filter_match().
trans-unit.target: 过滤器可能会更改它们在整个生命周期中匹配的项目。在这种情况下，它们将发出“ changed”信号，以通知先前的过滤器结果不再有效，并且应通过 gtk_filter_match() 再次检查项目。

trans-unit.source: Finally here’s a quick list of equivalent functionality to look for when transitioning code for easy lookup:
trans-unit.target: 最后，这里是在转换代码以方便查找时要查找的等效功能的快速列表：

trans-unit.source: Finally the window size is set using gtk_window_set_default_size() and the window is then shown by GTK via gtk_widget_show().
trans-unit.target: 最后，使用 gtk_window_set_default_size() 设置窗口大小，然后GTK通过 gtk_widget_show() 显示窗口。

trans-unit.source: Finally, fixed positioning makes it kind of annoying to add/remove GUI elements, since you have to reposition all the other elements. This is a long-term maintenance problem for your application.
trans-unit.target: 最后,固定的定位使得添加/删除GUI元素变得很麻烦,因为你必须重新定位所有其他元素。这对您的应用程序来说是一个长期的维护问题。

trans-unit.source: Finally, it's also possible to use simple arithmetic operators:
trans-unit.target: 最后,还可以使用简单的算术运算符。

trans-unit.source: Finally, use gtk_editable_delegate_set_property() in your set_property function (and similar for get_property), to set the editable properties:
trans-unit.target: 最后，在set_property函数（对于get_property类似 gtk_editable_delegate_set_property() 中使用gtk_editable_delegate_set_property（），以设置可编辑属性：

trans-unit.source: Find out whether the cursor should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 找出是否应该显示光标。

trans-unit.source: Find the widget which got the event.
trans-unit.target: 找到得到该事件的小组件。

trans-unit.source: Finds a cell property of a cell area class by name.
trans-unit.target: 按名称查找单元格区域类的单元格属性。

trans-unit.source: Finds the GtkNative associated with the surface.
trans-unit.target: 查找与曲面相关联的 GtkNative。

trans-unit.source: Finds the child of the GtkStack with the name given as the argument. Returns NULL if there is no child with this name.
trans-unit.target: 查找具有名称作为参数的GtkStack的子代。如果没有这个名字的孩子，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Finds the descendant of widget (including widget itself) closest to the screen at the point (x , y ). The point must be given in widget coordinates, so (0, 0) is assumed to be the top left of widget 's content area.
trans-unit.target: 查找在点（ x ， y ）上最靠近屏幕的 widget 的后代（包括 widget 本身）。该点必须在小部件坐标中给出，因此（0，0）被假定为 widget 内容区域的左上角。

trans-unit.source: Finds the icon at the given position and return its index. The position’s coordinates are relative to the entry ’s top left corner. If x , y doesn’t lie inside an icon, -1 is returned. This function is intended for use in a “query-tooltip” signal handler.
trans-unit.target: 在给定位置查找图标并返回其索引。位置的坐标是相对于 entry 的左上角的。如果 x ， y 不在图标内，则返回-1。此功能旨在用于“查询工具提示”信号处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Finds the index of the page which contains the given child widget.
trans-unit.target: 查找包含给定子部件的页面的索引。

trans-unit.source: Finds the path at the point (x , y ), relative to bin_window coordinates. That is, x and y are relative to an events coordinates. Widget-relative coordinates must be converted using gtk_tree_view_convert_widget_to_bin_window_coords(). It is primarily for things like popup menus. If path is non-NULL, then it will be filled with the GtkTreePath at that point. This path should be freed with gtk_tree_path_free(). If column is non-NULL, then it will be filled with the column at that point. cell_x and cell_y return the coordinates relative to the cell background (i.e. the background_area passed to gtk_cell_renderer_render()). This function is only meaningful if tree_view is realized. Therefore this function will always return FALSE if tree_view is not realized or does not have a model.
trans-unit.target: 查找相对于bin_window坐标的点（ x ， y ）处的路径。也就是说， x 和 y 相对于事件坐标。相对于小部件的坐标必须使用 gtk_tree_view_convert_widget_to_bin_window_coords() 进行转换。它主要用于弹出菜单之类的东西。如果 path 为非 NULL ，则此时将使用GtkTreePath填充它。应该使用 gtk_tree_path_free() 释放此路径。如果 column 为非 NULL ，则此时将用该列填充它。 cell_x 和 cell_y 返回相对于单元格背景的坐标（即，将 background_area 传递给 gtk_cell_renderer_render() ）。仅当实现 tree_view 时,此函数才有意义。因此，如果未实现 tree_view 或没有模型，此函数将始终返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: Finished the gtk_show_uri() call and returns the result of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 完成 gtk_show_uri() 调用并返回操作结果。

trans-unit.source: First make sure that you have the necessary external dependencies installed: pkg-config, Meson, Ninja, the JPEG, PNG, and TIFF libraries, FreeType, and, if necessary, libiconv and libintl. To get detailed information about building these packages, see the documentation provided with the individual packages. On any average Linux system, it’s quite likely you’ll have all of these installed already, or they will be easily accessible through your operating system package repositories.
trans-unit.target: 首先，请确保您已安装必需的外部依赖项： pkg-config ，Meson，Ninja，JPEG，PNG和TIFF库，FreeType，以及（如有必要）libiconv和libintl。要获取有关构建这些软件包的详细信息，请参阅各个软件包随附的文档。在任何普通的Linux系统上，很可能已经安装了所有这些软件，或者可以通过操作系统软件包系统信息库轻松访问它们。

trans-unit.source: First, it "cuts" the values from position to removed from the bitset. That is, it removes all those values and shifts all larger values to the left by removed places.
trans-unit.target: 首先，“切”，从值 position ，以 removed 从位集。也就是说，它将删除所有这些值，并将所有较大的值向左移动 removed 位置。

trans-unit.source: Flags a widget to be displayed. Any widget that isn’t shown will not appear on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 标记要显示的小部件。任何未显示的小部件都不会出现在屏幕上。

trans-unit.source: Flags affecting how a search is done.
Flags that affect how popover menus are created from a menu model.
trans-unit.target: 影响如何从菜单模型创建弹出式菜单的标志。

trans-unit.source: Flags that determine what to print
Flags that influence the behavior of gtk_widget_pick()
Flags that modify the behavior of gtk_style_context_to_string(). New values may be added to this enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 修改 gtk_style_context_to_string() 行为的标志。可以将新值添加到此枚举中。

trans-unit.source: Flags the column, and the cell renderers added to this column, to have their sizes renegotiated.
trans-unit.target: 标志着该列以及添加到该列的单元格渲染器的大小要重新协商。

trans-unit.source: Flags the widget for a rerun of the GtkWidgetClass::size_allocate function. Use this function instead of gtk_widget_queue_resize() when the widget 's size request didn't change but it wants to reposition its contents.
trans-unit.target: 标记窗口小部件以重新运行GtkWidgetClass :: size_allocate函数。当 widget 的大小请求未更改但希望重新定位其内容时，请使用此函数代替 gtk_widget_queue_resize() 。

trans-unit.source: Flags to influence what is picked
Flags used to influence dialog construction.
trans-unit.target: 用于影响对话框构建的标志。

trans-unit.source: Floating point numbers are parsed with g_ascii_strtod().
trans-unit.target: 浮点数使用 g_ascii_strtod() 进行解析。

trans-unit.source: Font description as a PangoFontDescription struct.
Font description as a string, e.g. “Sans Italic 12”.
trans-unit.target: 字符串形式的字体描述，例如“ Sans Italic 12”。

trans-unit.source: Font description as string, e.g. \"Sans Italic 12\".
trans-unit.target: 字体描述为字符串,例如:"Sans Italic 12"。

trans-unit.source: Font size as a scale factor relative to the default font size. This properly adapts to theme changes etc. so is recommended. Pango predefines some scales such as PANGO_SCALE_X_LARGE.
trans-unit.target: 字体大小作为相对于默认字体大小的比例系数。这可以适当地适应主题变化等,所以推荐使用。Pango预先定义了一些比例,如PANGO_SCALE_X_LARGE。

trans-unit.source: Font stretch as a PangoStretch, e.g. PANGO_STRETCH_CONDENSED.
Font style as a PangoStyle, e.g. PANGO_STYLE_ITALIC.
Font variant as a PangoVariant, e.g. PANGO_VARIANT_SMALL_CAPS.
Font weight as an integer, see predefined values in PangoWeight; for example, PANGO_WEIGHT_BOLD.
trans-unit.target: 字体重量为整数,参见PangoWeight中的预定义值;例如,PANGO_WEIGHT_BOLD。

trans-unit.source: Fonts other than the one you used to write the app will of course change the size of widgets containing text; keep in mind that users may use a larger font because of difficulty reading the default, or they may be using a different OS that provides different fonts.
trans-unit.target: 除了你用来编写应用程序的字体外,其他字体当然会改变包含文本的小部件的大小;请记住,用户可能会因为难以阅读默认的字体而使用较大的字体,或者他们可能会使用提供不同字体的不同操作系统。

trans-unit.source: For GTK widgets, any GtkStyleContext returned by gtk_widget_get_style_context() will already have a GdkDisplay and RTL/LTR information set. The style context will also be updated automatically if any of these settings change on the widget.
trans-unit.target: 对于GTK窗口小部件，由 gtk_widget_get_style_context() 返回的任何GtkStyleContext都已经设置了GdkDisplay和RTL / LTR信息。如果这些设置中的任何一个在小部件上发生更改，样式上下文也将自动更新。

trans-unit.source: For a lot of data formats, the amount of data is very small (like GDK_TYPE_RGBA), so enabling this property does not hurt at all. And for local-only drag'n'drop operations, no data transfer is done, so enabling it there is free.
trans-unit.target: 对于许多数据格式，数据量非常小（如 GDK_TYPE_RGBA ），因此启用此属性完全没有害处。对于仅本地拖放操作，不会进行任何数据传输，因此启用它是免费的。

trans-unit.source: For a rotation in 2D space, use gsk_transform_rotate().
trans-unit.target: 要在2D空间中旋转，请使用 gsk_transform_rotate() 。

trans-unit.source: For a simple list of textual choices, the model-view API of GtkComboBox can be a bit overwhelming. In this case, GtkComboBoxText offers a simple alternative. Both GtkComboBox and GtkComboBoxText can contain an entry.
trans-unit.target: 对于简单的文本选择列表，GtkComboBox的模型视图API可能有点让人不知所措。在这种情况下，GtkComboBoxText提供了一种简单的替代方法。GtkComboBox和GtkComboBoxText都可以包含一个条目。

trans-unit.source: For a version that does not take a transform, see gtk_widget_size_allocate()
trans-unit.target: 有关不进行转换的版本，请参见 gtk_widget_size_allocate()

trans-unit.source: For all the subnodes added to the text node in various situations, see GtkText.
trans-unit.target: 有关在各种情况下添加到文本节点的所有子节点，请参见GtkText。

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to use this, see g_markup_parse_context_push() which has the same kind of API.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何使用它的示例，请参见具有相同API的 g_markup_parse_context_push() 。

trans-unit.source: For any other GtkLicense value, the contents of the “license” property are also set by this property as a side effect.
trans-unit.target: 对于任何其他GtkLicense值，此属性还设置了“ license”属性的内容作为副作用。

trans-unit.source: For asymptotic performance comparisons between tree- and array-based implementations, see this article.
trans-unit.target: 有关基于树的实现和基于数组的实现之间的渐近性能比较，请参阅本文。

trans-unit.source: For backwards compatibility reasons this method will never return GTK_ALIGN_BASELINE, but instead it will convert it to GTK_ALIGN_FILL. Baselines are not supported for horizontal alignment.
trans-unit.target: 出于向后兼容的原因，此方法将永远不会返回 GTK_ALIGN_BASELINE ，而是会将其转换为 GTK_ALIGN_FILL 。水平对齐不支持基线。

trans-unit.source: For cell renderers that ellipsize or wrap text; this property controls the maximum reported width of the cell. The cell should not receive any greater allocation unless it is set to expand in its GtkCellLayout and all of the cell's siblings have received their natural width.
trans-unit.target: 对于省略或环绕文本的单元格渲染器；此属性控制报告的单元格的最大宽度。除非将其设置为在其GtkCellLayout中扩展并且该单元的所有同级都已收到其自然宽度，否则该单元不应收到任何更大的分配。

trans-unit.source: For combo boxes that are created with an entry (See GtkComboBox:has-entry).
trans-unit.target: 对于创建有条目的组合框(参见GtkComboBox:has-entry)。
为了方便起见，还提供了 gtk_widget_class_set_template_from_resource() 。

trans-unit.source: For converting widget coordinates (eg. the ones you get from GtkWidget::query-tooltip), please see gtk_tree_view_convert_widget_to_bin_window_coords().
trans-unit.target: 要转换小部件坐标（例如，从GtkWidget :: query-tooltip获得的坐标），请参见 gtk_tree_view_convert_widget_to_bin_window_coords() 。

trans-unit.source: For custom entries, it is highly recommended that you implement the GtkEditable interface by using a GtkText widget as delegate. If you do this, GTK will make your widgets text editing functionality accessible in the same way as a GtkSpinButton or GtkSearchEntry.
trans-unit.target: 对于自定义条目，强烈建议您通过使用GtkText小部件作为委托来实现GtkEditable接口。如果这样做，GTK将使您的小部件文本编辑功能可以与GtkSpinButton或GtkSearchEntry相同的方式访问。

trans-unit.source: For details on how to write shaders, see GskGLShader.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何编写着色器的详细信息，请参见GskGLShader。

trans-unit.source: For each directory in this list, GTK actually looks in a subdirectory directory/version/host/type. Where version is derived from the version of GTK (use pkg-config --variable=gtk_binary_version gtk4 to determine this from a script), host is the architecture on which GTK was built. (use pkg-config --variable=gtk_host gtk4 to determine this from a script), and type is a directory specific to the type of modules; currently it can be modules, immodules or printbackends, corresponding to the types of modules mentioned above. Either version, host, or both may be omitted. GTK looks first in the most specific directory, then in directories with fewer components. The components of GTK_PATH are separated by the “:” character on Linux and Unix, and the “;” character on Windows.
trans-unit.target: 对于此列表中的每个目录，GTK实际上都在一个子目录 directory/version/host/type 中查找。如果 version 是从GTK的版本派生的（使用 pkg-config --variable=gtk_binary_version gtk4 从脚本中确定），则 host 是构建GTK的体系结构。 （使用 pkg-config --variable=gtk_host gtk4 从脚本中确定），并且 type 是特定于模块类型的目录；当前，它可以是 modules ， immodules 或 printbackends ，与上述模块的类型相对应。任一 version ， host ，或者两者都可以省略。GTK首先在最特定的目录中查找，然后在组件较少的目录中查找。 GTK_PATH 的组件在Linux和Unix上由“：”字符和“;”分隔。Windows上的字符。

trans-unit.source: For each property of GtkTextTag, there is a “set” property, e.g. “font-set” corresponds to “font”. These “set” properties reflect whether a property has been set or not. They are maintained by GTK+ and you should not set them independently.
trans-unit.target: 对于GtkTextTag的每个属性，都有一个“设置”属性，例如，“ font-set”对应于“ font”。这些“设置”属性反映了是否已设置属性。它们由GTK +维护，您不应单独设置它们。

trans-unit.source: For every level of depth, another "indent" node is prepended.
trans-unit.target: 对于每一级深度,都会在前面再加一个 "缩进 "节点。

trans-unit.source: For example, "menu:minimize,maximize,close" specifies a menu on the left, and minimize, maximize and close buttons on the right.
trans-unit.target: 例如,"menu:minimum,maximum,close "指定左边的菜单,右边的最小化、最大化和关闭按钮。

trans-unit.source: For example, “icon:minimize,maximize,close” specifies a icon on the left, and minimize, maximize and close buttons on the right.
trans-unit.target: 例如，“ icon：minimize，maximize，close”在左侧指定一个图标，而在右侧指定最小化，最大化和关闭按钮。

trans-unit.source: For example, if model is a product catalogue, then a compare function for the “price” column could be one which returns price_of(@a) - price_of(@b).
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 model 是产品目录，则“ price”列的比较函数可以是返回 price_of(@a) - price_of(@b) 的比较函数。

trans-unit.source: For example, when queried in the normal GTK_SIZE_REQUEST_HEIGHT_FOR_WIDTH mode: First, the default minimum and natural width for each widget in the interface will be computed using gtk_widget_measure() with an orientation of GTK_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL and a for_size of -1. Because the preferred widths for each widget depend on the preferred widths of their children, this information propagates up the hierarchy, and finally a minimum and natural width is determined for the entire toplevel. Next, the toplevel will use the minimum width to query for the minimum height contextual to that width using gtk_widget_measure() with an orientation of GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL and a for_size of the just computed width. This will also be a highly recursive operation. The minimum height for the minimum width is normally used to set the minimum size constraint on the toplevel.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当以常规 GTK_SIZE_REQUEST_HEIGHT_FOR_WIDTH 模式查询时：首先，将使用 gtk_widget_measure() 以 GTK_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL 的方向和for_size为-1来计算界面中每个小部件的默认最小宽度和自然宽度。因为每个小部件的首选宽度取决于其子级的首选宽度，所以此信息沿层次结构向上传播，最后为整个顶层确定了最小且自然的宽度。接下来，顶层将使用 gtk_widget_measure() 以 GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL 的方向使用最小宽度来查询与该宽度相关的最小高度以及刚刚计算出的宽度的for_size。这也是一个高度递归的操作。最小宽度的最小高度通常用于在顶层设置最小尺寸约束。

trans-unit.source: For instance at GtkCellAreaContextClass.allocate() time it’s important to know details about any cell spacing that the GtkCellArea is configured with in order to compute a proper allocation.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 GtkCellAreaContextClass.allocate() 时，了解有关配置GtkCellArea的任何单元格间距的详细信息以计算适当的分配非常重要。

trans-unit.source: For instance, GtkIconView creates all icons (rows) to have the same width and the cells theirin to have the same horizontal alignments. However each row of icons may have a separate collective height. GtkIconView uses this to request the heights of each row based on a context which was already used to request all the row widths that are to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 例如，GtkIconView创建的所有图标（行）具有相同的宽度，而其单元格则具有相同的水平对齐方式。但是，每行图标可以具有单独的集合高度。GtkIconView使用它来基于上下文请求每行的高度，该上下文已经用于请求要显示的所有行宽。

trans-unit.source: For instance, a GtkLabel that does height-for-width word wrapping will not expect to have GtkWidgetClass.measure() with an orientation of GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL called because that call is specific to a width-for-height request. In this case the label must return the height required for its own minimum possible width. By following this rule any widget that handles height-for-width or width-for-height requests will always be allocated at least enough space to fit its own content.
trans-unit.target: 例如，执行宽度换高的自动换行的GtkLabel不会期望调用方向为 GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL 的 GtkWidgetClass.measure() ，因为该调用特定于宽度换高的请求。在这种情况下，标签必须返回其自身最小可能宽度所需的高度。通过遵循此规则，将始终为处理宽度为高度或宽度为高度请求的任何小部件分配至少足够的空间以适合其自身的内容。

trans-unit.source: For instance, if the rows are displayed all with the same width from top to bottom then a change in the allocated width necessitates a recalculation of all the displayed row heights using gtk_cell_area_get_preferred_height_for_width().
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果显示的行从上到下都具有相同的宽度，则分配宽度的更改需要使用 gtk_cell_area_get_preferred_height_for_width() 重新计算所有显示的行高。

trans-unit.source: For instance, to build a bar rendered with five blocks, it’s sufficient to set the minimum value to 0 and the maximum value to 5 after changing the indicator mode to discrete.
trans-unit.target: 例如，要构建一个包含五个块的条形图，将指示符模式更改为离散后，将最小值设置为0，将最大值设置为5就足够了。

trans-unit.source: For instance, with the horizontal orientation, the widgets will be arranged from left to right, starting a new row under the previous row when necessary. Reducing the width in this case will require more rows, so a larger height will be requested.
trans-unit.target: 例如,在水平方向的情况下,小组件将从左到右排列,必要时在前一行下面开始新的一行。在这种情况下,减少宽度将需要更多的行,因此将要求更大的高度。

trans-unit.source: For key events, the top-level window gets a first shot at activating mnemonics and accelerators. If that does not consume the events, the target widget for event propagation is window’s current focus widget (see gtk_window_get_focus()).
trans-unit.target: 对于关键事件，顶层窗口会在激活助记符和加速器时首先显示出来。如果那不占用事件，则事件传播的目标窗口小部件是窗口的当前焦点窗口小部件（请参阅 gtk_window_get_focus() ）。

trans-unit.source: For keyboard presses to start a search, the search bar must be told of a widget to capture key events from through gtk_search_bar_set_key_capture_widget(). This widget will typically be the top-level window, or a parent container of the search bar. Common shortcuts such as Ctrl+F should be handled as an application action, or through the menu items.
trans-unit.target: 为了使键盘按下以开始搜索，必须告知搜索栏一个小部件，以通过 gtk_search_bar_set_key_capture_widget() 捕获键事件。该小部件通常是顶级窗口或搜索栏的父容器。常见的快捷键（例如Ctrl + F）应作为应用程序操作或通过菜单项进行处理。

trans-unit.source: For menus, the “halign” and “valign” properties of the menu are also taken into account. For example, when the direction is GTK_ARROW_DOWN and the horizontal alignment is GTK_ALIGN_START, the menu will be positioned below the button, with the starting edge (depending on the text direction) of the menu aligned with the starting edge of the button. If there is not enough space below the button, the menu is popped up above the button instead. If the alignment would move part of the menu offscreen, it is “pushed in”.
trans-unit.target: 对于菜单，还考虑了菜单的“ halign”和“ valign”属性。例如，当方向为 GTK_ARROW_DOWN 且水平对齐方式为 GTK_ALIGN_START 时，菜单将位于按钮下方，菜单的起始边缘（取决于文本方向）与按钮的起始边缘对齐。如果按钮下方没有足够的空间，则会在按钮上方弹出菜单。如果对齐方式会将菜单的一部分移出屏幕，则将其“推入”。

trans-unit.target: 调用该函数为一个项目的子项目创建GListModel。
