trans-unit.source: Function type for determining whether column can be dropped in a particular spot (as determined by prev_column and next_column ). In left to right locales, prev_column is on the left of the potential drop spot, and next_column is on the right. In right to left mode, this is reversed. This function should return TRUE if the spot is a valid drop spot. Please note that returning TRUE does not actually indicate that the column drop was made, but is meant only to indicate a possible drop spot to the user.
trans-unit.target: 用于确定是否可以将 column 放到特定位置的函数类型（由 prev_column 和 next_column 确定）。在从左到右的语言环境中， prev_column 在潜在放置点的左侧，而 next_column 在右侧。在从右到左的模式下，这是相反的。如果该点是有效的放置点，则此函数应返回 TRUE 。请注意，返回 TRUE 实际上并不表示已完成该列放置，而只是向用户指示可能的放置位置。

trans-unit.source: Function type for determining whether the row pointed to by iter should be rendered as a separator. A common way to implement this is to have a boolean column in the model, whose values the GtkTreeViewRowSeparatorFunc returns.
trans-unit.target: 用于确定 iter 指向的行是否应呈现为分隔符的函数类型。一种常见的实现方法是在模型中包含一个布尔列，该列的值由GtkTreeViewRowSeparatorFunc返回。

trans-unit.source: Functionally, GtkAccessible roles, states, properties, and relations are analogous to a CSS for assistive technologies. For screen reader users, for instance, the various accessible attributes control the rendering of their non-visual experience. Incorrect roles and attributes may result in a completely inaccessible user interface.
trans-unit.target: 从功能上讲，GtkAccessible角色，状态，属性和关系类似于辅助技术的CSS。例如，对于屏幕阅读器用户而言，各种可访问属性控制着他们的非视觉体验的呈现。不正确的角色和属性可能会导致完全无法访问用户界面。

trans-unit.source: Furthermore for implementations of GtkCellLayout that use a GtkCellArea to lay out cells (all GtkCellLayouts in GTK use a GtkCellArea) cell properties can also be defined in the format by specifying the custom <cell-packing> attribute which can contain multiple <property> elements defined in the normal way.
trans-unit.target: 此外，对于使用GtkCellArea布置单元格的GtkCellLayout的实现（GTK中的所有GtkCellLayouts都使用GtkCellArea），也可以通过指定自定义<cell-packing>属性来以格式定义单元格属性，该属性可以包含多个定义的<property>元素以通常的方式。
GDK X 窗口系统交互

trans-unit.source: GDK keyval usable for accelerators, or GDK_KEY_VoidSymbol
trans-unit.target: 可用于加速器的GDK键值,或GDK_KEY_VoidSymbol。

trans-unit.source: GDK translates these raw windowing system events into GdkEvents. Typical input events are button clicks, pointer motion, key presses or touch events. These are all represented as GdkEvents, but you can differentiate between different events by looking at their type, using gdk_event_get_event_type().
trans-unit.target: GDK将这些原始窗口系统事件转换为GdkEvents。典型的输入事件是按钮单击，指针移动，按键或触摸事件。这些都以GdkEvents表示，但是您可以使用 gdk_event_get_event_type() 通过查看事件的类型来区分它们。

trans-unit.source: GFile pointing to a file to load

GListStore is backed by a balanced tree and has performance characteristics that are expected for that data structure. It works reasonably well for dataset sizes in the 1,000,000 range, and can handle insertions and deletions. It uses a cached iter to make linear access to the items fast.
trans-unit.target: GListStore由平衡树支持,并具有该数据结构所期望的性能特征。它在数据集大小在1,000,000范围内工作得相当好,并且可以处理插入和删除。它使用缓存迭代器,使对项目的线性访问变得快速。

trans-unit.source: GTK also supports baseline vertical alignment of widgets. This means that widgets are positioned such that the typographical baseline of widgets in the same row are aligned. This happens if a widget supports baselines, has a vertical alignment of GTK_ALIGN_BASELINE, and is inside a widget that supports baselines and has a natural “row” that it aligns to the baseline, or a baseline assigned to it by the grandparent.
trans-unit.target: GTK还支持小部件的基线垂直对齐。这意味着微件的位置应使同一行中微件的印刷基线对齐。如果窗口小部件支持基线，垂直对齐方式为 GTK_ALIGN_BASELINE ，并且在窗口小部件内部支持基线并且具有与基线或祖父母指定的基线对齐的自然“行”，则会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: GTK also supports color expressions, which allow colors to be transformed to new ones. Color expressions can be nested, providing a rich language to define colors. Color expressions resemble functions, taking 1 or more colors and in some cases a number as arguments.
trans-unit.target: GTK还支持颜色表达式,可以将颜色转化为新的颜色。颜色表达式可以嵌套,提供了一个丰富的语言来定义颜色。颜色表达式类似于函数,可以接受1种或多种颜色,在某些情况下还可以接受一个数字作为参数。

trans-unit.source: GTK applies the style information found in style sheets by matching the selectors against a tree of nodes. Each node in the tree has a name, a state and possibly style classes. The children of each node are linearly ordered.
trans-unit.target: GTK通过将选择器与节点树相匹配来应用样式表中的样式信息。树中的每个节点都有一个名字、一个状态和可能的样式类。每个节点的子节点是线性排序的。

trans-unit.source: GTK automatically takes care of this in most situations, e.g. when the user goes to a different page, or when the visibility or completeness of a page changes.
trans-unit.target: GTK会在大多数情况下自动处理这个问题,例如当用户转到不同的页面,或者当页面的可见性或完整性改变时。

trans-unit.source: GTK calls signal (SIGPIPE, SIG_IGN) during initialization, to ignore SIGPIPE signals, since these are almost never wanted in graphical applications. If you do need to handle SIGPIPE for some reason, reset the handler after gtk_init(), but notice that other libraries (e.g. libdbus or gvfs) might do similar things.
trans-unit.target: GTK在初始化期间调用 signal (SIGPIPE, SIG_IGN) 以忽略SIGPIPE信号，因为在图形应用程序中几乎不需要这些信号。如果由于某些原因确实需要处理SIGPIPE，请在 gtk_init() 之后重置处理程序，但请注意，其他库（例如libdbus或gvfs）可能会执行类似的操作。

trans-unit.source: GTK can use the cache files created by gtk4-update-icon-cache to avoid a lot of system call and disk seek overhead when the application starts. Since the format of the cache files allows them to be shared across multiple processes, for instance using the POSIX mmap() system call, the overall memory consumption is reduced as well.
trans-unit.target: GTK可以使用gtk4-update-icon-cache创建的缓存文件来避免在应用程序启动时产生大量的系统调用和磁盘查找开销。由于缓存文件的格式允许它们在多个进程之间共享，例如使用POSIX mmap（）系统调用，因此总的内存消耗也减少了。

trans-unit.source: GTK cannot guarantee that the evaluation did indeed change when the notify gets invoked, but it guarantees the opposite: When it did in fact change, the notify will be invoked.
trans-unit.target: GTK不能保证在调用 notify 时评估确实确实发生了变化，但它保证了相反的情况：当实际上进行了更改时， notify 将被调用。

trans-unit.source: GTK comes with a large variety of layout containers whose purpose it is to control the layout of the child widgets that are added to them. See Layout containers for an overview.
trans-unit.target: GTK带有各种各样的布局容器，其目的是控制添加到其中的子窗口小部件的布局。有关概述，请参见布局容器。

trans-unit.source: GTK defines macros for a number of style classes.
trans-unit.target: GTK为一些样式类定义了宏。

trans-unit.source: GTK deprecation annotations are versioned; by defining the macros GDK_VERSION_MIN_REQUIRED and GDK_VERSION_MAX_ALLOWED, you can specify the range of GTK versions whose API you want to use. APIs that were deprecated before or introduced after this range will trigger compiler warnings.
trans-unit.target: GTK弃用注释已版本化；通过定义宏 GDK_VERSION_MIN_REQUIRED 和 GDK_VERSION_MAX_ALLOWED ，可以指定要使用其API的GTK版本的范围。在此范围之前或之后不推荐使用的API将触发编译器警告。

trans-unit.source: GTK emits the “icon-press” and “icon-release” signals only on sensitive, activatable icons.
trans-unit.target: GTK仅在敏感的可激活图标上发出“ icon-press”和“ icon-release”信号。

trans-unit.source: GTK extends the CSS syntax for images and also uses it for specifying icons. To load a themed icon, use
trans-unit.target: GTK扩展了图片的CSS语法,也使用它来指定图标。要加载一个主题图标,使用

trans-unit.source: GTK extends the CSS syntax with several additional ways to specify colors.
trans-unit.target: GTK扩展了CSS语法,增加了几种指定颜色的方法。

trans-unit.source: GTK for the X Window System
trans-unit.target: GTK for the X Window System

trans-unit.source: GTK handles accelerators and mnemonics in a global scope, during the capture phase, and key bindings locally, during the target phase.
trans-unit.target: GTK在捕获阶段在全局范围内处理加速器和符号,在目标阶段在本地处理键绑定。

trans-unit.source: GTK has an extremely powerful framework for multiline text editing. The primary objects involved in the process are GtkTextBuffer, which represents the text being edited, and GtkTextView, a widget which can display a GtkTextBuffer. Each buffer can be displayed by any number of views.
trans-unit.target: GTK具有强大的多行文本编辑框架。该过程涉及的主要对象是GtkTextBuffer和GtkTextView，GtkTextBuffer代表正在编辑的文本，该控件可以显示GtkTextBuffer。每个缓冲区可以通过任意数量的视图显示。

trans-unit.source: GTK has functions for asking the window manager to do various things; see for example gtk_window_minimize() or gtk_window_maximize(). Keep in mind that most window managers will ignore certain requests from time to time, in the interests of good user interface.
trans-unit.target: GTK具有要求窗口管理器执行各种操作的功能；参见例如 gtk_window_minimize() 或 gtk_window_maximize() 。请记住，出于良好的用户界面的考虑，大多数窗口管理器都会不时忽略某些请求。

trans-unit.source: GTK has traditionally supported different kinds of shortcuts:
trans-unit.target: GTK历来支持不同种类的快捷键。

trans-unit.source: GTK includes an interactive debugger, called the GTK Inspector, which lets you explore the widget tree of any GTK application at runtime, as well as tweak the theme and trigger visual debugging aids. You can easily try out changes at runtime before putting them into the code.
trans-unit.target: GTK包含了一个交互式调试器,叫做GTK Inspector,它可以让你在运行时探索任何GTK应用程序的widget树,以及调整主题和触发可视化调试辅助。你可以很容易地在运行时尝试更改,然后再将其放入代码中。

trans-unit.source: GTK includes application support that is built on top of GApplication. In this tutorial we’ll build a simple application by starting from scratch, adding more and more pieces over time. Along the way, we’ll learn about GtkApplication, templates, resources, application menus, settings, GtkHeaderBar, GtkStack, GtkSearchBar, GtkListBox, and more.
trans-unit.target: GTK包括在GApplication之上构建的应用程序支持。在本教程中，我们将从头开始构建一个简单的应用程序，并随着时间的推移添加越来越多的片段。在此过程中，我们将学习GtkApplication，模板，资源，应用程序菜单，设置，GtkHeaderBar，GtkStack，GtkSearchBar，GtkListBox等。

trans-unit.source: GTK inspects a number of environment variables in addition to standard variables like LANG, PATH, HOME or DISPLAY; mostly to determine paths to look for certain files. The X11, Wayland, Windows and Broadway GDK backends use some additional environment variables.
trans-unit.target: 除了标准变量（如 LANG ， PATH ， HOME 或 DISPLAY )外，GTK还检查许多环境变量;主要用于确定查找某些文件的路径。在X11，韦兰，视窗和百老汇GDK后端使用一些额外的环境变量。

trans-unit.source: GTK is a widget toolkit. Each user interface created by GTK consists of widgets. This is implemented in C using GObject, an object-oriented framework for C. Widgets are organized in a hierarchy. The window widget is the main container. The user interface is then built by adding buttons, drop-down menus, input fields, and other widgets to the window. If you are creating complex user interfaces it is recommended to use GtkBuilder and its GTK-specific markup description language, instead of assembling the interface manually. You can also use a visual user interface editor, like glade.
trans-unit.target: GTK是一个小部件工具箱。 GTK创建的每个用户界面都包含小部件。这是使用GObject（一种面向C的面向对象的框架）在C中实现的。窗口小部件按层次结构进行组织。窗口小部件是主要容器。然后，通过向窗口添加按钮，下拉菜单，输入字段和其他窗口小部件来构建用户界面。如果要创建复杂的用户界面，建议您使用GtkBuilder及其特定于GTK的标记描述语言，而不是手动组装界面。您还可以使用可视用户界面编辑器，例如glade。

trans-unit.source: GTK is a widget toolkit. Each user interface created by GTK consists of widgets. This is implemented in C using GObject, an object-oriented framework for C. Widgets are organized in a hierarchy. The window widget is the main container. The user interface is then built by adding buttons, drop-down menus, input fields, and other widgets to the window. If you are creating complex user interfaces it is recommended to use GtkBuilder and its GTK-specific markup description language, instead of assembling the interface manually. You can also use a visual user interface editor, like glade.
trans-unit.target: GTK是一个小部件工具箱。 GTK创建的每个用户界面都包含小部件。这是使用GObject（一种面向C的面向对象的框架）在C中实现的。窗口小部件按层次结构进行组织。窗口小部件是主要容器。然后，通过向窗口添加按钮，下拉菜单，输入字段和其他窗口小部件来构建用户界面。如果要创建复杂的用户界面，建议您使用GtkBuilder及其特定于GTK的标记描述语言，而不是手动组装界面。您还可以使用可视用户界面编辑器，例如glade。

trans-unit.source: GTK is event-driven. The toolkit listens for events such as a click on a button, and passes the event to your application.
trans-unit.target: GTK是事件驱动的。工具箱监听事件,比如点击按钮,并将事件传递给你的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: GTK itself does not support event sounds, you have to use a loadable module like the one that comes with libcanberra.
trans-unit.target: GTK本身不支持事件声音,你必须使用一个可加载的模块,比如libcanberra自带的模块。

trans-unit.source: GTK makes no effort to ensure that map_func conforms to the item type of self . It assumes that the caller knows what they are doing and the map function returns items of the appropriate type.
trans-unit.target: GTK不会努力确保 map_func 符合 self 的项目类型。它假定调用者知道他们在做什么，并且map函数返回适当类型的项目。

trans-unit.source: GTK makes no effort to ensure that model conforms to the item type expected by the map function. It assumes that the caller knows what they are doing and have set up an appropriate map function.
trans-unit.target: GTK不会努力确保 model 符合地图功能期望的项目类型。它假定调用方知道他们在做什么，并且已经设置了适当的map函数。

trans-unit.source: GTK normally uses the Alt modifier for mnemonics, except in GtkPopoverMenus, where mnemonics can be triggered without any modifiers. It should be very rarely necessary to change this, and doing so is likely to interfere with other shortcuts.
trans-unit.target: 除了GtkPopoverMenus中的助记符，无需任何修饰符即可触发助记符，GTK通常将助记符用于Alt修饰符。几乎不需要更改它，否则可能会干扰其他快捷方式。

trans-unit.source: GTK offers a wide variety of wrapping models which change or supplement an existing model (or models) in some way. But when it comes to storing your actual data, there are only a few ready-made choices available: GListStore and GtkStringList.
trans-unit.target: GTK提供了各种包装模型，这些包装模型以某种方式更改或补充了一个或多个现有模型。但是，在存储实际数据时，只有几种现成的选择可用：GListStore和GtkStringList。

trans-unit.source: GTK provides a GIO extension point for GtkMediaFile implementations to allow for external implementations using various media frameworks. GTK itself includes implementations using GStreamer and ffmpeg.
trans-unit.target: GTK为GtkMediaFile实现提供了GIO扩展点，以允许使用各种媒体框架进行外部实现。GTK本身包括使用GStreamer和ffmpeg的实现。

trans-unit.source: GTK provides default implementations of the most common selection modes such as GtkSingleSelection, so you will only need to implement this interface if you want detailed control about how selections should be handled.
trans-unit.target: GTK提供了最常见的选择模式（例如GtkSingleSelection）的默认实现，因此，如果要详细控制选择的处理方式，则只需要实现此接口即可。

trans-unit.source: GTK provides powerful widgets to display and edit lists of data. This document gives an overview over the concepts and how they work together to allow developers to implement lists.
trans-unit.target: GTK提供了强大的部件来显示和编辑数据列表。本文档概述了这些概念,以及它们如何共同工作以使开发人员能够实现列表。

trans-unit.source: GTK provides two simple models that can be used: the GtkListStore and the GtkTreeStore. GtkListStore is used to model list widgets, while the GtkTreeStore models trees. It is possible to develop a new type of model, but the existing models should be satisfactory for all but the most specialized of situations. Creating the model is quite
trans-unit.target: GTK提供了两个可以使用的简单模型：GtkListStore和GtkTreeStore。 GtkListStore用于对列表小部件进行建模，而GtkTreeStore用于对树进行建模。可以开发一种新型的模型，但是除了最特殊的情况以外，现有模型应该对所有模型都令人满意。创建模型相当

trans-unit.source: GTK provides various pre-made filter implementations for common filtering operations. These filters often include properties that can be linked to various widgets to easily allow searches.
trans-unit.target: GTK为常见的过滤操作提供了各种预制的过滤器实现。这些过滤器通常包括可以链接到各种widget的属性,以便于进行搜索。

trans-unit.source: GTK provides various pre-made sorter implementations for common sorting operations. GtkColumnView has built-in support for sorting lists via the “sorter” property, where the user can change the sorting by clicking on list headers.
trans-unit.target: GTK为常见的分类操作提供了各种预制的分类器实现。GtkColumnView具有通过“ sorter ”属性对列表进行排序的内置支持，用户可以在其中单击列表标题来更改排序。

trans-unit.source: GTK provides version information, primarily useful in configure checks for builds that have a configure script. Applications will not typically use the features described here.
trans-unit.target: GTK提供了版本信息,主要是对有configure脚本的构建的配置检查有用。应用程序通常不会使用这里描述的功能。

trans-unit.source: GTK sets the default text direction according to the locale during gtk_init(), and you should normally use gtk_widget_get_direction() or gtk_widget_get_default_direction() to obtain the current direction.
trans-unit.target: GTK在 gtk_init() 期间根据语言环境设置默认文本方向，通常应使用 gtk_widget_get_direction() 或 gtk_widget_get_default_direction() 来获取当前方向。

trans-unit.source: GTK supports CSS properties and shorthands as far as they can be applied in the context of widgets, and adds its own properties only when needed. All GTK-specific properties have a -gtk prefix.
trans-unit.target: GTK支持CSS属性和速记,只要它们可以应用在widgets的上下文中,并且只在需要的时候添加自己的属性。所有GTK特有的属性都有一个-gtk前缀。

trans-unit.source: GTK supports Drag-and-Drop in tree views with a high-level and a low-level API.
trans-unit.target: GTK通过高级和低级的API支持树形视图中的Drag-and-Drop。

trans-unit.source: GTK supports markup for clickable hyperlinks in addition to regular Pango markup. The markup for links is borrowed from HTML, using the <a> with “href“, “title“ and “class“ attributes. GTK renders links similar to the way they appear in web browsers, with colored, underlined text. The “title“ attribute is displayed as a tooltip on the link. The “class“ attribute is used as style class on the CSS node for the link.
trans-unit.target: 除了常规的Pango标记外，GTK还支持可单击超链接的标记。链接的标记是使用具有<h>，“ href”，“ title”和“ class”属性的 <a> 从HTML借用的。GTK使用带颜色的带下划线的文本来呈现类似于在Web浏览器中出现的链接的链接。“标题”属性显示为链接上的工具提示。“ class”属性在链接的CSS节点上用作样式类。

trans-unit.source: GTK supports profiling with sysprof. It exports timing information about frameclock phases and various characteristics of GskRenderers in a format that can be displayed by sysprof or GNOME Builder.
trans-unit.target: GTK 支持使用 sysprof 进行剖析,它以一种可以由 sysprof 或 GNOME Builder 显示的格式输出有关帧时钟阶段和 GskRenderers 各种特性的定时信息。

trans-unit.source: GTK supports scaled rendering on hi-resolution displays. This works best if images can specify normal and hi-resolution variants. From CSS, this can be done with
trans-unit.target: GTK支持在高分辨率显示器上进行缩放渲染。如果图像可以指定正常和高分辨率的变体,这一点效果最好。在CSS中,可以用

trans-unit.source: GTK treats a dialog as a window split vertically. The top section is a GtkBox, and is where widgets such as a GtkLabel or a GtkEntry should be packed. The bottom area is known as the “action area”. This is generally used for packing buttons into the dialog which may perform functions such as cancel, ok, or apply.
trans-unit.target: GTK将对话框视为垂直拆分的窗口。顶部是GtkBox，应在其中包装GtkLabel或GtkEntry之类的小部件。底部区域称为“动作区域”。通常用于将按钮打包到对话框中，这些按钮可以执行诸如取消，确定或应用之类的功能。

trans-unit.source: GTK uses a height-for-width (and width-for-height) geometry management system. Height-for-width means that a widget can change how much vertical space it needs, depending on the amount of horizontal space that it is given (and similar for width-for-height). The most common example is a label that reflows to fill up the available width, wraps to fewer lines, and therefore needs less height.
trans-unit.target: GTK使用了一个height-for-width(和width-for-height)的几何管理系统。Height-for-width 意味着一个widget可以改变它所需要的垂直空间,这取决于给它的水平空间的大小(width-for-height也类似)。最常见的例子是一个标签,它可以回流以填满可用的宽度,包裹到更少的线条,因此需要更少的高度。

trans-unit.source: GTK uses actions for its own purposes in a number places. These built-in actions can sometimes be activated by applications, and you should avoid naming conflicts with them when creating your own actions.
trans-unit.target: GTK在很多地方都使用了动作来实现自己的目的。这些内置的动作有时可以被应用程序激活,你在创建自己的动作时应该避免与它们的命名冲突。

trans-unit.source: GTK uses these environment variables to locate icon themes and MIME information. For more information, see the Icon Theme Specification the Shared MIME-Info Database and the Base Directory Specification.
trans-unit.target: GTK使用这些环境变量来定位图标主题和MIME信息。有关更多信息，请参见图标主题规范，共享的MIME-Info数据库和基本目录规范。

trans-unit.source: GTK uses this environment variable to provide startup notification according to the Startup Notification Spec. Following the specification, GTK unsets this variable after reading it (to keep it from leaking to child processes). So, if you need its value for your own purposes, you have to read it before calling gtk_init().
trans-unit.target: GTK使用此环境变量根据启动通知规范提供启动通知。按照规范，GTK在读取变量后将其设置为未设置（以防止其泄漏给子进程）。因此，如果您出于个人目的需要它的值，则必须在调用 gtk_init() 之前先读取它。

trans-unit.source: GTK uses this to make styling information from GtkSettings available.
trans-unit.target: GTK使用它来提供来自GtkSettings的样式信息。

trans-unit.source: GTK uses this type to determine how the message is displayed.
trans-unit.target: GTK使用这个类型来决定消息的显示方式。

trans-unit.source: GTK widgets generally deal with the logical devices, and thus can be used with any pointing device or keyboard.
trans-unit.target: GTK小部件一般处理逻辑设备,因此可以与任何指向设备或键盘一起使用。

trans-unit.source: GTK will enable debugging code paths in both the debug and debugoptimized build types. Builds with buildtype set to debug will additionally enable consistency checks on the internal state of the toolkit.
trans-unit.target: GTK将使两个调试代码路径 debug 和 debugoptimized 构建类型。将 buildtype 设置为 debug 的构建将另外启用对工具箱内部状态的一致性检查。

trans-unit.source: GTK will try to fill in some information by using ancillary UI control properties, for instance the accessible label will be taken from the label or placeholder text used by the UI control, or from its tooltip, if the GTK_ACCESSIBLE_PROPERTY_LABEL property or the GTK_ACCESSIBLE_RELATION_LABELLED_BY relation are unset. Nevertheless, it is good practice and project hygiene to explicitly specify the accessible properties, just like it’s good practice to specify tooltips and style classes.
trans-unit.target: GTK将尝试通过使用辅助UI控件属性来填充一些信息，例如，如果未设置 GTK_ACCESSIBLE_PROPERTY_LABEL 属性或 GTK_ACCESSIBLE_RELATION_LABELLED_BY 关系，则可访问标签将从UI控件使用的标签或占位符文本或其工具提示中获取。。尽管如此，优良作法和项目卫生习惯是明确指定可访问的属性，就像优良作法是指定工具提示和样式类一样。

trans-unit.source: GTK+ will keep the application running as long as it has any windows.
trans-unit.target: 只要有任何窗口，GTK +都会使该 application 保持运行状态。
